price: 17. Al-lah os advierte que no debéis volver a hacer nunca algo similar, si de verdad sois creyentes.
arabic: يَعِظُكُمُ ٱللَّهُ أَن تَعُودُواْ لِمِثۡلِهِۦٓ أَبَدًا إِن كُنتُم مُّؤۡمِنِينَ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish. published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: yaʿiẓukumu al-lahu an taʿūdū limith'lihi abadan in kuntum mu'minīna
